The shots seemed to make Train Wreck angrier, but not at all damaged. Holoc=
aust is hit and knocked out of the ground.

Deemos: Don't take any prisoner=
s!

Perplex stepped outside of the base, which might have been a good idea.=


Perplex: Okay, Deemos, you and me, one on one.

Deemos aimed the knife gu=
n directly at Perplex's head. They were a good many feet away, but Deemos' =
aim was true. He fires it. Perplex aims to knock it out of the way, which i=
sn't a good idea, because he kinda sucks. Arrow steps out. That's okay, bec=
ause Arrow kicks ass. Sarge steps out, which was bad.

Sarge: No, I want De=
emos! I'm leader around here and I order myself to take Deemos!...
